verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Is there a heart o’erbound by sorrow? Is there a life weighed down by care? Come to the cross, each burden bearing; All your anxiety—leave it there.

verse.name: c
verse.lines: All your anxiety, all your care, Bring to the mercy seat, leave it there, Never a burden He cannot bear, Never a friend like Jesus!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: No other friend so swift to help you, No other friend so quick to hear, No other place to leave your burden, No other one to hear your prayer.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Come then at once; delay no longer! Heed His entreaty kind and sweet, You need not fear a disappointment; You shall find peace at the mercy seat.
